title: Problem in the connection
body:
I have been playing this game since i was 13 years old and yesterday i had a inssue with the connection to league, i don't know what's wrong, firewall don't block the game and there are no inssues or at least that's what i think so, Is the server having problems?.
I don't know but i really want a freaking answer, if someone can help please tell me what's wrong because i want to play and the game don't even launch. Aah...

replies.body: If you're having issues connecting to a game then something might be blocking your network from reaching the game server.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up, while making sure to go over each instruction.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make absolutely certain that your firewall settings are correct.  Let me know if you have any questions!
